prompt: I want you to act as a Matlab Program Developer. Your task is to develop a Matlab program for optimizing a 2D low-thrust spiral interplanetary rendezvous trajectory using the direct method. The program should model and optimize the trajectory of a spacecraft travelling from Earth to an asteroid that is practically circular and coplanar with randomly generated initial position and velocity vectors. The electric propulsion ion thruster specs include max thrust of 1.77 N 5000 kg of xenon throughput mass specific impulse of 2600 s and a max launch window of 5 years. Include the following features in the program: 1. Model and optimize the low-thrust spiral trajectory design using the direct method for a spacecraft travelling from Earth to the asteroid. 2. Provide necessary user-defined functions for the optimization process. 3. Plot the orbits and trajectories of the spacecraft and the asteroid. 4. Include clear comments and explanations for each section of the code and any user-defined functions used in the program. Please provide the complete Matlab code.
